title: #28: FBI Agent Bobby Chacon and Recovering Victims Using Aquatic Forensic Teams
description:
Former FBI Agent Robert "Bobby" Chacon joins the show to discuss the Laci Peterson, Chelsea King and Samantha Koenig murders and his involvement with aquatic forensics with the FBI. Featuring Bodhi Elfman (Mr. Scratch from Criminal Minds) .

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
